attributes.additional_details: We are plainly going no where with the present cabinet set up or with it's HeadMaster David Cameron. We need change and FAST, how do you feel about BORIS JOHNSON taking over from David Cameron in a quest to getting people interested in their own country, interested in working and also interested in a future they can enjoy and to stop giving our tax money away to other coutries when we plainly need it for our own?-A PM should support it's people, it does but only the rich people! Sign this petition to say you want Boris Johnson as Prime Minister.
